name: Leonardo S.p.A.
membership: ASD (Aerospace and Defence Industries Association of Europe) - EOS (European Organization for Security) - Confindustria - UNIFE (Association of the European Rail Industry)
goal: Leonardo is the main Italian industrial group operating globally in the aerospace, defence and security sectors, and is one of the world's leading groups in the fields of helicopters and defence electronics. It is also a European Leader for satellite and space services. Headquartered in Italy, and with a vast industrial base in the UK as well as important production facilities in the rest of Europe and the USA, Leonardo has a workforce more than 46,000.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU and NATO activities related with Aerospace Security and Defence
